website_summaries.verdict: Easily dispense wipes are perfect for convenient, regular use.
pros: Packaging is durable and effectively dispenses wipes one at a time
Wipes away dirt and odor without having to hop in the bath
Durable wipes don’t tear, even on tough paws
cons: Wipes begin to dry after about a month, but they can be easily re-hydrated with a little water

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: I NEVER write reviews. Like all the other dog lovers, I did my research and the reviews for this one seemed fine. Okay so the lid does NOT shut. Theyre soooo dry. Especially with this kind of lid that springs open, ALL the moist will fly off the firsy day or two. DO not get these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a waste
customer_reviews.text: What did I dislike about this product? There isn't enough moisture on them to do anything. I might as well use a kleenex. I had to put each one that I pulled out under running water and then squeeze it out for the entire wipe to be of any use - from cleaning paws to wiping down my dogs coat to use for cleaning around the eyes - there just wasn't any liquid. And I checked the dates - wasn't expired, brand new box, smelled ok. Its just a big box of precut squares that you need to add water to. Buy a roll of paper towels. Save money.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great for Gland Leakage
customer_reviews.text: My dog has overactive anal glands, (yes, I have them expelled regularly by the vet) and these wipes do a great job of getting rid of the rotten dead fish smell. The cherry scent is very pleasant and not overwhelming; there isn't a strong smell left on my dog. When she's leaking really bad I'll use the wipes a few times a day on her bum and tail fur. She hasn't had a reaction to them and doesn't seem bothered when I wipe her. I suggest storing these in an airtight container or ziplock bag so they don't dry out. This is one of many great Earthbath products.
customer_reviews.author: S. PatrickTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: NOPE
customer_reviews.text: These were the worst wipes ever. Had barely any moisture to them and then dried out within a few weeks. I had to use 10 just to wipe down my 45 lb beagle/lab mix. Will not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: KimberlyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: I would probably like the product better if the container WORKED
customer_reviews.text: I would probably like the product better if the container WORKED!!!!!!!! A waste of money if the woes will dry out. The overall LID doesn't stay on! Wore the closure tab ALSO DOESN"T close or work. FED up truly. Whats the point if you sell this and have inferior packaging! Will never buy this again. So now thank you , really have to keep tape on to keep it shut and in a ziplock bag!!!!!! I SURE HOPE after this the product is decent!
customer_reviews.author: kathleen conway

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a dry
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for a dry, dirty situation, as in running through a field or digging in dirt (which my dog LOVES). If it's a wet, dirty situation I wouldn't recommend these (but I think we all know at that point you just have to give your dog a bath!). My dog has super sensitive skin and is on a regimen of apoquel and weekly baths with medicated shampoo but these are great for those in between days and after walks. He doesn't mind them but will lick of any residue.
customer_reviews.author: em

customer_reviews.title: Stinky Puppy Tested
customer_reviews.text: Oh thank goodness for these. Our new puppy seems to be the queen of finding stinky things. 5 bathes in just one week and she was itching all the time. We needed a way to wipe off what ever she rolled in without needing to give her a full bath. Sure enough the day after buying these she found something else and came in stinky as usual. We wiped her down and it did the trick. It's helped a lot with keeping her smelling clean without having to dry her out with bath after bath. She's very thankful for them too. She was not a fan of the bath. lol
customer_reviews.author: Chad AddingtonTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Never had an issue with dryness
customer_reviews.text: I used a few different wipes from other brands but recently came back to Earthbath. Comparing to other brands, the thickness, moist level, scent and effect of Earthbath are perfect in my opinion. It is thick enough to do the job but soft. It eliminates oder and keeps my pup smell fine between bath. Some other reviewers claim that it is dry but I've never had issues with it... Some other brand's wipes that I used until recently have lots moisture and my dog used to leave footprints on the floor after cleaning his paws, which I didn't like. The moisture level of Earthbath is perfect - not too wet, not too dry.
customer_reviews.author: TKTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Fragrance free are mos definitely NOT FRAGRANCE FREE!
customer_reviews.text: NOT Fragrance free! Far from it. I am sensitive to fragrances and these are like grandma perfume. Very expensive and no better than baby wipes that are a fraction of the cost of these. I even tried to rinse under water before using and the smell is still lingering on my puppy 24 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid doesn't close - returning this as defective
customer_reviews.text: These wipes seem okay but the container design is flawed and will not close. I've tried every way I could to close it but nothing works. Sending this back. It's useless to have a supply of wipes that are dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Joy R.

customer_reviews.title: Wipes don't wipe
customer_reviews.text: The Earthbath Puppy Wipes I got were largely unsatisfactory. They were pleasantly scented, and they did my hands no harm. Unfortunately, they did the puppy no good. They simply aren't moist enough to pick up soil, sticky, or saliva from this very smooth, short-haired coat, and they were also too dry to clean dirty feet or a very messy mustache. At the same time, they weren't able to absorb moisture from wet or muddy feet. Moreover, they were incompletely cut, so removing one from the dispenser required two hands, Finally, I found them too small; unfolded they were still not large enough to keep my hand from the surface being wiped.
customer_reviews.author: Gma Sara

customer_reviews.title: These are great pet wipes
customer_reviews.text: These are great pet wipes. I got them for one cat who developed an allergy after a vaccine, and I used it to cool off the inflamed skin around his neck and tail. I have since used them for wiping the face of one of my foster cats who had chronic rhinitis. People think cats would not like these kinds of items bc they are wet, but they do not really feel the light moisture and the grooming is a pleasant experience for them. Last but not least I used them for my obese kitty who sometimes needs her butt wiped ;-) because she cannot reach it herself. Even tho she isn't thrilled, the wipes work their magic-!
customer_reviews.author: wdgolf

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with the quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these wipes to clean my dogs rear end after he poops. I'm very pleased with the quality. I read other review that said they were thin and also potentially dried out. I have not had this problem. They are thick enough to get the job done. I even just used them to scrub an area of the carpet where my cat puked while I was gone and they didn't tear. They don't seem to have a strong scent, so if you are getting them just because you want to perfume your dog, I would look elsewhere. But for those people who might be sensitive to scents, this wipe is not very offensive. I got the mango tango variety.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Long time user but now I’d give zero stars if available!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a horribly frustrating product. The “follow up” sheet rarely comes up in the last two packages that I have purchased. I’ve used these for years but will NEVER buy again. It’s so difficult to reach the “next sheet” through the small hole , so it means opening & closing the lid. Not the easiest thing to do with arthritic hands. Why a manufacturer changes a product that used to work I will never understand!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jennM

customer_reviews.title: When you must wipe the dog's butt 5x/day
customer_reviews.text: Our Frenchie is a poop machine. Sadly, Frenchie's are notorious for not being able to evacuate "stuff" so sometimes you have to clean them up. Originally we sprayed his butt with a garden hose on low pressure but that was a pain to do. We found these wipes locally at Petsmart for 3$ more, Amazon had better pricing so we bought a bajillion containers since we plan on having our Frenchie for another 11-13 years. Likely, we'll need to buy more. They also are great for wiping the folds of his skin, cleaning out his ears, and just giving him a quick "doggie bath".
customer_reviews.author: Just a user

customer_reviews.title: No complaints - good product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to switch from the scented kinds because I suspected those were irritating my dog's paws and causing her to lick her paws a lot. The Good: no scent at all. Sturdy plastic container keeps the moisture sealed well. Each wipe can tackle the bum and the paws if you're precise (mostly on a small dog). It shipped and was delivered within 4 days. The bad: The hard plastic top and slot for pulling the wipes make it difficult to reach the wipes when they get low. There are cheaper wipes but this is a reputable product/brand (we purchase their shampoo products).
customer_reviews.author: Keith Sweatshirt

customer_reviews.title: This do not smell like mango first off
customer_reviews.text: This do not smell like mango first off. They do clean but the clip close latch has never worked so I had to tape it and take the whole lid off. There are 100 wipes but there are small and flimsy. I clean my dogs feet after walks to remove excess dirt and this brand takes 6 while others took 2. So if your pet is messy, you'll need a bunch. Not worth it to me, I'm almost done with one box in a week.
customer_reviews.author: Miami Marty

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: I really like these wipes. They take away my puppy's smelliness, and I believe they reduce her dander; they definitely take care of the pup's dustiness in another New Mexico drought year... I'm allergic to "puppy smell" and dander AND to dust. Wiping her after she's been out isn't her favorite thing so we struggle a little, and eventually she settles down. Unfortunately, using wipes isn't particularly green, so I'm going to try another brand of dander remover that comes with a reusable mitt. Still, this product really works!
customer_reviews.author: sospanyol

customer_reviews.title: Container won’t close, but scent is pleasant
customer_reviews.text: The product smells good and left my pups coat looking nice, but the container will not close. Super frustrating since it even says directly on the box to keep the lid closed tight. It barely fits in a standard zip lock bag, which will have to do for now in order for the whole tub not to dry out and be useless. Would have loved these if it closed properly, but something meant to be simple is now a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this before & was very happy. They are perfect for my pug & multiple daily wash ups in one day that do not dry him out or irritate him. However, I reordered and they sent me the wrong ones “puppy wipes”. Very upset as I’m almost out of the last set & now worried they’ll mess up again. if I reorder it will also delay my order more!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette C.

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price but...
customer_reviews.text: Giving it 2 stars because it does clean my kittens and its a plastic container not a pouch. That's it really. I'm not a fan of the scent, it's a little musky/pungent. Also the wipes are on the thin side. Lastly, once I got the plastic wrapping off and opened the box for the first wipe, it wouldn't close. The latch wouldn't connect. So I had to pry it up with a tweezer for like 10 minutes to get it to stay up enough to catch and close the lid. I'm going to have to go back to Well & Good after these are done- twice the price but thicker, softer, clean-scented wipes.
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: More damp then wet towelettes
customer_reviews.text: While I appreciate the strength of these wipes and the nice container, the wipes are not very wet. They’re more damp and don’t really do the job. As such, I have to use multiple wipes after we come back from a walk. I expected these to be more like baby wipes or the wetness of Clorox wipes, but they’re not. I’m thinking about adding a bit of water and light soap to get them up to par. If you like actual moist towelettes then order something else.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: but not great. I thought i would love the packaging but ...
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are alright, but not great. I thought i would love the packaging but it was actually very inconvenient. Once you get halfway, or even 1/3 of the way in, the wipes don't reach the top to pop out. so every time i would need a wipe i would have to dig in the little opening for the next wipe which was very annoying. the wipes themselves are a good size but not that moist. Also compared to other wipes i have used, they weren't very thick. but three stars because for the cheap price, they're decent.
customer_reviews.author: Marylin K.

customer_reviews.title: Cleanliness is next to godliness
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Use these wipes all the time to clean his paws or a general rub down after the park. The cloths do get stuck as in they don’t follow the previous sheet out the box but it doesn’t bother me too much. Moist enough that it feels like he’s getting cleaned but not super wet where it feels like I need to then dry his fur off after using. No scent which I prefer and overall great to use.
customer_reviews.author: lovetoread

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes for our pooches
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit concerned with some reviews which complained about RECENT quality of EBs. Having tried Petkins (China), these US made wipes are thicker, larger and just as moist. All natural and fragrance free are a plus. The storage box is easily accessible and self-supporting. Cheaper from Amazon compared our local pet stores. One wipe is enough to clean paws, tidy legs and cleaning the hair around our Goldendoodle's bum.
customer_reviews.author: Rott boy

customer_reviews.title: It's true, the flap is wonky.
customer_reviews.text: Sweet cherry scent, great for the pups! She's nine but still quite a puppy and she doesn't mind the smell. Like other reviewers say, the box does not latch close but I knew that going in. Petco sells this for $16! I was appalled that I could get it for half the cost on Amazon. Anyway, some packaging tape over the flap fixed the problem and works just fine. I prefer to use the tape anyway b/c it keeps the towelettes moist longer. Sometimes I spray a little water on it when it's a little dry but it's not dry yet since I just got it. It's been great to use and I have no other complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Tu

customer_reviews.title: These are the best 🐶
customer_reviews.text: For years I have used wet paper towels to clean up my dogs back end after going potty. A friend told me about these wipes and the difference is remarkable both for me and my dogs. If you have not tried these I suggest you order them. You definitely will be very, very pleased and so will your fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: SC lady

customer_reviews.title: Good item to have, especially for very young pups!
customer_reviews.text: Nice sized, good thickness, pleasant fragrance. Wipes are a MUST for a young puppy. Cleaing the pup after each pee event can prevetn urinary tract infections and can also help your pup not stink like puppy-pee all the time! Very young pups sometimes don't have good bladder control while they sleep and they benefit from a nice, all-over wipe down in the morning. I also use store brand, "Natural" baby wipes to clean all my dogs, which is less expensive than this fancy puppy version, but the scent on these is helpful at the very young puppy stage, and worth the extra expense.
customer_reviews.author: M. Gross

customer_reviews.title: Great Grooming Wipes
customer_reviews.text: I love the Earthbath All Natural Hypo-Allergenic Wipes for my dog. They are great for cleaning paws but I especially use them to keep my dog's "bottom" clean. (No marks on my couch or rugs). The sheets are just the right size, strong and have the correct amount of moisture. I read one reviewer that the sheets didn't contain enough moisture. I did not find this to be true with mine. I am very happy with my purchase and will reorder when I run low. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TattooGrandma

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cat who needs extra freshening up
customer_reviews.text: I've found these wipes pretty handy for my cat. It is not at all like bathing him, just to freshen up his coat a bit. I think it's perfect for cats. And bonus, my cat loves them! He lies down and purrs while I am using the wipes. He does always bathe himself afterwards.. I don't think he likes the smell or residue left behind.. But that's okay because a little extra cleaning can't hurt! I would not recommend for dogs, because these do not really "clean" and dogs need a lot more cleaning that what these offer. Perfect for a cat who needs an extra "freshening up".
customer_reviews.author: Sara S

customer_reviews.title: 5 star, All Natural Wipes
customer_reviews.text: Bought twice. I've been looking for all natural wipes for my dog, since I usually wipe him down 4-5 times a day. The smell is natural and I feel comfortable wiping him down knowing the ingredients are natural. The packaging of the box makes it convenient to open and close the lid. Some dog wipes have lids that are difficult to open and close, which also loses the freshness of the wipes. Overall, a 5 star product and will continue to purchase!
customer_reviews.author: jena

customer_reviews.title: ... or even the wet toilet paper wipes these will disappoint they're very dry and have little cleaning ability because ...
customer_reviews.text: If you're used to baby wipes or even the wet toilet paper wipes these will disappoint they're very dry and have little cleaning ability because of that. I'll probably just buy a cheap brand of baby wipes. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: TJH

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite puppy things
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite wipes. I got the mango scented ones this time (actually by accident) but it ended up being great. They smell divine. I love that these seem to be just the right level of moistness if that makes sense. Sometimes you get wipes that are doused in the cleaning solution and they end up making more of a mess. These are light and effective. This time around my pop-top lid was damaged which is a real bummer so I hope they don't dry out but in general, I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Pollard

customer_reviews.title: Not life changing.
customer_reviews.text: Basically a glorified baby wipe. The container does NOT stay closed. I have to rest a bag of dog food on top of it in my dog supply cabinet to keep it shut. Also the wipes don't come out one right after another as they should. I have to open the whole lid to pull them out. Would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Leilss

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Not the best mango smell, but does the job. The top is not as easy to snap-close, but after you get the hang of it, it should be fine. I had to push it down at an angle to get it to snap shut. Nothing too bad. I think it really depends on if you can stand the smell or not. Siblings didn't like it, I could tolerate it.
customer_reviews.author: Kipp

customer_reviews.title: I love these wipes and so does my fur baby
customer_reviews.text: These wipes smell so yummy. My friend recommended these as a freshen up in between baths and it works wonders! The amazon price I feel cant be beat and I love having prime. Earthbath All Natural Grooming Wipes are so wonderful and I honestly feel they are not hard on my little puppy. My nose is a bit too much and by too much I mean super sensitive to odors while the hubby and kiddos think she doesn't smell I do and these are a good resort in between baths with a good brush down after I wipe her down she looks stunning.
customer_reviews.author: DIPC

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are perfect. I work in a machine shop
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are perfect. I work in a machine shop, so when I bring my pup to work he gets filthy. I don't want to bath him every week so instead, I use these the clean him off in between baths. They work great and smell nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on the pet!
customer_reviews.text: This works great!! My cat is a senior and she's been having problems being clean after using the litter. The wipes are so good that it's removing things stuck to her fur!! No scent, perfect. Only thing was the box was cracked so hopefully thid doesn't dry out the wipes
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: I love Earthbath products, they are my choice products for my big boys!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice and big and do the job very well, I usually only need to use two on a really muddy dog! I love that they are unscented, As I do not enjoy my dog smelling like fruity dog! I can also say, that my Lab is the kinda dog who usually runs from me when I have used smelly wipe downs, but he does not take off or struggle through his wipe down. I also use the sensitive allergy unscented dog bath wash for both my boys and LOVE that as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ddaeng

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves these!
customer_reviews.text: According to most websites my vizsla only needs a bath every 3 months. These are great to use daily or even every other day as he loves to explore our 24 acre property and hay field. Helps to keep him smelling great. Also it helps to calm him down, almost like a massage.
customer_reviews.author: Sheena

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Scented wipes for our furbabies
customer_reviews.text: We love these wipes. They work very well for cleaning and wiping down our bulldogs. It works well to clean out their face folds as well as wiping down their whole body after coming in from outside and smelling like the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: NDCallahan

customer_reviews.title: great ingredients just a little dry
customer_reviews.text: these are great and they have the best ingredients out of all the puppy wipes i looked into. the only issue is that they're a little dry. I'm having to spray them with a bit of water before using them.
customer_reviews.author: sof

customer_reviews.title: My cat doesn't particularly enjoy me wiping her down with them but I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat doesn't particularly enjoy me wiping her down with them but I don't think it is the wipes fault. It is much easier to use on her than foaming shampoo sometimes I try which sends her running when she sees the bottle. I am very pleased with these wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Joe F

customer_reviews.title: Smells good, we love it!!
customer_reviews.text: We love love love this product...the only downside for us is the price. We use this grooming wipes all the time that we need refills too soon. To save some moolah, we've decided to cut the wipes in half. ;) Our puppy never had any problems with it. No rashes or sneezing. We use this all the time to wipe his paws after outside play, or after pooping or peeing. We have a miniature schnauzer, so we need to wipe his muzzle quite often too to get rid of food debris or dirt sticking on his "mustache". So far no side effects. Keeps are puppy clean, and our noses happy. It smells really good.
customer_reviews.author: HArbizo

customer_reviews.title: Cleaning without water
customer_reviews.text: I use these wipes after brushing my dogs well. I also use them for my 12 year old dog who can no longer clean his anus because of his arthritis. I use them to clean his anus without irritating the area. Be sure to be gentle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously effective at removing stubborn slobber stains!
customer_reviews.text: These grooming wipes are AMAZING!! Yes, they clean your dog very well, but they also get industrial strength slobber off of your clothes. Even the ones that have already gone through the wash and come out just like they went in. They are very gentle, but they really work. Don't know how they do it, but don't ever want to be without these. If you have a big dog, you need them!
customer_reviews.author: 505Fanatics

customer_reviews.title: Best product and ingredients out there for your pet and your own convenience.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are the best out there when it comes to ingredients and effectiveness. My dogs love them, too. They are soft, with a great light scent and with just the right amount of wetness. The ingredients are the best you can find for your pet.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for not dog
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are great. I use them everyday to wipe the dog down after each walk. They have the perfect amount of shortness and moisture. They are large enough and strong enough to wipe her body and paws. She’s 10lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver for wet dog smell
customer_reviews.text: Lifesavers when we go to the dog park. I always have one of these in the trunk of my car. Removes most of the wet-dog-out-of-the-lake smell so it’s not in my car and we do not need to bath the dogs every single time we go to the park (multiple times per week in the summer).
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love these. I use these on our labrador retr
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I use these on our labrador retr. in between baths. They are really great for getting rid of any doggy smell that might happen right before she is due for a bath. She is an old dog and these wipes buy us some extra time before bath time. She enjoys being rubbed with the wipes- I imagine it is like getting a massage for her. I also use them on our 20 year old cat who doesn't wash her self very much anymore- these wipes are excellent for her as they have no scent. I will always use these- they are the best!
customer_reviews.author: AMY

customer_reviews.title: Get the Job Done
customer_reviews.text: I expected these to have a pleasant clean scent to them that would linger on the dog, and they don't have that. I usually use 2 to make sure I remove that "invisible" odor that lingers after the dog rolls in whatever, and I'm disappointed that it takes 2 wipes. But they seem to do the job, and I love Earth Bath, they are very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D in TN

customer_reviews.title: The only wipe my dog will tolerate
customer_reviews.text: My dog has always hated wipes, to the point where we stopped buying them because he won't even allow us to use them on him! However, with his ragweed allergies, we have decided we need to try again. I got these hypo-allergenic wipes, and for some reason, my dog more than tolerates them, he actually approaches me and allows me to wipe him down with them!! I don't know if there is something particularly pleasant about these wipes, or if the other wipes were just so irritating to him. Either way, I will certainly continue to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wipes for your dog
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. I also buy their shampoo for my dog. The wipes are just as great. They are all natural and safe for your pets. My dog has skin allergies and a lot of products irritate her skin. She has never had problems with this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P. Ceppos

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for your pup!
customer_reviews.text: Love these wipes! Great for puppy paws on the way inside from the dog park or a walk. Also works well to keep in the car or packing for a trip. The dispenser is a push to open so easy to use and stays close to prevent drying out of the wipes
customer_reviews.author: kija

customer_reviews.title: Great for therapy dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! My yorkie is a therapy dog and I use these wipes before and after our visits to wipe down his paws and coat. I also use them to gently wipe his booty and other (lol) after he goes outside to use the potty. I only do this once a day and it keeps him smelling fresh and clean. I found them to get a little dry so I added some water to them (purified). I find that you have to close the top with a gentle tap right in the front to close it and keep it closed. Overall love these and highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Kitties like it, I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I want to make sure our kitties are as clean as possible. They don't seem to like water, so I had to look for alternatives that they could tolerate. I figured I'd give these grooming wipes a try. I brush them, wipe them and brush them again. Our longhair kitten, in particular, really loves getting brushed, and he tolerates the wipes. I'd say he either likes them or just deals with it. The shorthair kitten, knowing he doesn't NEED to be brushed to the same extent, isn't as thrilled. I personally love the wipes because I think the kitties are getting cleaned - and they smell great afterwards. I will keep purchasing these!
customer_reviews.author: mdgrl79

customer_reviews.title: Strong, soft, & safe
customer_reviews.text: We like these because they're thick enough to clean dirty paws without ripping, they're safe, and they don't affect the Frontline we've applied. We keep them by the back door to wipe off outdoor dirt, but we occasionally grab them for other purposes - for example, I'm mopping and our dog runs across the detergent-covered floor. I like the release mechanism on the box; you just press a button. They're soft, and ours stay moist to the bottom of the box. The only downside is that they're a little expensive, but they work well and simplify our lives, so it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Not very good quality
customer_reviews.text: We usually buy this brand but the green tea version, these were not as good..for one thing, not even 1/4 through box and wipes are drying oyt..Maybe boxes not as good or less moisture? Next not having the fragrance of the green tea all it does is spread the urine smell around. We bought two boxes but won't be buying these agaib.
customer_reviews.author: Sweet Angel

customer_reviews.title: and they work beautifully, with the added bonus that he's cleaner overall ...
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are so helpful...I use them every day. I have an elderly cat who has to take multiple liquid medicines twice a day...which inevitably means some gets on his fur (as you can imagine, he's not exactly thrilled with this regimen). Before I bought these wipes, I'd clean up the spills with a damp paper towel or wash cloth, which never quite did the trick and left stick spots on his fur. Now, I just pull out a wipe...and they work beautifully, with the added bonus that he's cleaner overall and smells better, too (even though I use the unscented)!
customer_reviews.author: AAO

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Smells alright but I actually don't smell it on my dog or cat at all. The wipe itself smells but barely transfers over to help with dog and cat odor. I bathe my dog often but sometimes like to freshen up her coat or clean her up after being outside which is why I bought these but they don't really do anything. These work great for getting dirt off paws and keeping them clean.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Bolobov

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for dogs with seasonal allergies!
customer_reviews.text: My dog has really bad summer allergies (she scratches CONSTANTLY!), so I bought these to wipe her down after she plays outside. She'll spend hours out there laying in the grass and playing in my flower garden, so she accumulates a lot of pollen and allergens on her fur. I wipe her belly, inner thighs, and paws. I've been using them on her once or twice a day for about a week and they seem to have really helped! These, plus weekly baths, have significantly reduced her itching. These are unscented, by the way, which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Alex B.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy container lid, but great wipes
customer_reviews.text: I used to use pawtizers, but switched to this product. Cleans my dog's paws well after daily walks. The container latch that opens and closes the lid can be hit or miss, as the latch does not engage the extension on the lid. Simple solution is to take your keys or flat head screw driver and push the latch on the container up, to help the lid to close. Overall, great product
customer_reviews.author: S.K.

customer_reviews.title: Dispensing Part Needs Much Improvement
customer_reviews.text: Great Product....only problem is opening on top is not wide enough to get fingers in to bottom of box as the volume gets lower. There are no teeth to hold the last one so you can just pull and dispense them like the clorox type wipes dispenser. Otherwise, really nice wipes, well moist, dogs loved them but had to switch to another brand so that they would dispense better.
customer_reviews.author: Dejae's

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes for your dog.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are truly good. They clean my dog’s eyes better than any other. I use them on his body too, to keep him clean between baths, and they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Xandra

customer_reviews.title: F
customer_reviews.text: These are decent wipes. I feel like they dry out pretty fast when you start wiping but the size of each wipe is pretty good. The case is not that good quality and mine was cracked when it was delivered so I removed the wipes and put in Ziploc bag. The scent is a nice soft scent that seems to neutralize odor.
customer_reviews.author: Keiyana L.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, unscented wipes in a convenient container
customer_reviews.text: My one cat is a bushy little creature and tends to always have something- usually rather unpleasant- in his fur. These are great wipes that help keep him clean and not stinky. I use them on his butt, tail, stomach and face when he needs it, which seems to be everyday! I love that they are unscented, hypoallergenic and they don't bother my cat at all. I like that they are in a plastic container as it makes them super easy to store. Most importantly- they help immensely in my quest to not smell like a crazy cat lady!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: LOVE using for everyday use on toy poodle.
customer_reviews.text: I love love love these wipes! I use them every time my dog comes in the house from being outside. These are perfect for the clean freaks that don't want icky paws and booties on their furniture!! They smell nice, and I love the fact that they are all natural. This keeps my toy poodle looking fresh and clean!
customer_reviews.author: MBHE

customer_reviews.title: I have the previous one so I will transfer the wipes to the old one but in a product where it's usefulness is based on the liqui
customer_reviews.text: This is at least the third time that I have purchased this product but I do not know that I will again. I took off the plastic outer wrapping off and opened the container and the lid would not snap shut. I have the previous one so I will transfer the wipes to the old one but in a product where it's usefulness is based on the liquid content this is not a good situation. If the lid cannot close the product will dry out and be useless. I was disappointed in the quality of the container.
customer_reviews.author: Autum Leah

customer_reviews.title: Bad Packaging
customer_reviews.text: The product arrived with 2 of the three boxes cracked. In that condition the wipes dry out.
customer_reviews.author: Granny Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Please Earthbath, never discontinue these natural, unscented wipes!
customer_reviews.text: Great work Earthbath! Although I might enjoy scented wipes more (the mango tango sounds wonderful) with the extreme sensitivity of dogs noses, I'm not so sure that dogs do! I hate the thought of using scented products on my dog for this reason. I am on my second box of these, and will continue to purchase. My dog doesn't seem to mind these at all and although I am not sure if she can smell any of the ingredients that I can't smell, they are all natural, don't irritate her skin, and she comes willingly to get cleaned up, so I'm happy that she's happy. Thanks Earthbath! I will be buying your unscented shampoo next!
customer_reviews.author: Food, Glorious Food!Top Contributor: Baking

customer_reviews.title: All I'll buy now!
customer_reviews.text: These are by far the best dog wipes I've ever encountered. The packaging seals well so the wipes don't dry out and my dog loves their cool feel, especially after coming inside from the heat. At least, that's what I assume he's saying when he bumps his nose into me for more after I stop wiping him. Leaves his fur soft and has even helped cut down on the shedding. And with these being all natural, they worked great when I had dirt and grease on my hands and these were the closest thing I could grab. :)
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N.

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: These wipes are eating at my 2 cats skin ever since we started using them. They have be itching and over grooming, and this is the only change we have introduced to them.
customer_reviews.author: Ant

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for my geriatric cat....dont use them on their bottom though because if its "caked" it will hurt them. I use a very soft cloth with warm soapy water (not hot) for that area, and then rinse it with clean warm water and sometimes need a little vaseline on the cloth too.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Good Wipes
customer_reviews.text: The top of the box snaps in place to help prevent drying out. They should come out one at a time, but they don't; I seem to get a small cluster that I stuff back in the container. The scent is sort of like baby powder, it's okay, but at least it's not too strong. I wouldn't use these to really clean my dog; but they are great for in-between, or wiping off paws and belly after a long walk or dog park visit.
customer_reviews.author: AU DustTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good for in between baths
customer_reviews.text: My Scottie has contact allergies so I keep these in the car for after walks. Good size but they don't clean dirt / mud off paws particularly well.
customer_reviews.author: mountainmover

customer_reviews.title: I'm really happy and pleased with these doggie wipes
customer_reviews.text: I'm really happy and pleased with these doggie wipes! I use them to clean up my dogs paws but also to clean up the part privates of my senior toy poodle who wears a reusable diaper. I highly recommend these for anyone who has a senior dog that uses diapers. Update: These are no longer PRIME so I will be taking my money elsewhere. What a shame since I was just about to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Matt & ElaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Decent for spot cleaning, not great for odor or heavy dirt
customer_reviews.text: They work well enough, and they're certainly easier to wrangle than trying to get the cat into the tub for a bath, but they don't clean very thoroughly -- really they're more for light cleaning than getting rid of ick or grunge on the cat's fur. They also don't do much about those times when your cat's rear end smells worse than the Port Authority bus stop on a 101 degree August day.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Paolucci

customer_reviews.title: works and smells great
customer_reviews.text: I use this for grooming my pet when the weather is super cold and uses piddle pads. Never sticky, smells fantastic and is very soft. She loves the special pampering too. and no harsh chemicals !!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Wipes
customer_reviews.text: Got these and right away from opening package the lid didn't work right. It wouldn't close, so I had to find a baggy to put these in so they wouldn't dry out. It was wrapped very tightly, so it appeared that lid closed properly, until I took off wrapper. Not sure it may have been a one time fluke thing but, otherwise, the wipes are great.
customer_reviews.author: Norma Jean

customer_reviews.title: Cracked packaging
customer_reviews.text: These wipes use to come with lids that sometimes didn’t close. With the more recent packaging design, the lids work better but I’ve received three (out of four) of these where the bottom of the wipes plastic box is cracked pretty bad. Over $13 a box is a lot to pay for that. Also my dogs are chihuahua mixes so the size of the wipes are fine. Owners with large dogs may want to go with pogo’s or another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Little E

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Love these for a quick clean up while camping or on the road. Typical Earthbath quality! I don't use tons of these so I when I get them I separate them into 3 or 4 sections, put them in a ziploc bag, remove the air and they stay moist and last a very long time. Really handy and the smells are not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: DonnaD

customer_reviews.title: Great for the pup's feet after a wet walk in the rain, for example.
customer_reviews.text: These wipes provide our family with just the right amount of comfort to clean our dog's feet without any affects on her feet at all (no allergic reactions or strong odors after using). We have a small dog now so it works well on her feet, however, I don't know if these are big enough for really big dogs' feet (Great Danes or some breed of that nature). Since there's no lingering odor, there's no possibility o an allergic reaction, or so I think anyway, as I'm not a Veterinarian! Usually they're priced we'll enough to make us feel as though we got a good deal vs. the price in retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Scooter1968

customer_reviews.title: Handy wipe for our Shih Tsu
customer_reviews.text: We often include fresh pumpkin in our Shih Tsu's bowl with dry dog food. When she's finished eating, she has an orange face! These wipes are easy on her skin and work fairly well in getting out the leftover pumpkin that has gotten caught up in her muzzle. I also like to take a wipe and just rub it around her little body. it freshens her up a bit. And it's great for wiping paws that come in with mud, loose leaves and other outdoor things she might step into.
customer_reviews.author: zna2212

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and natural!
customer_reviews.text: My French Bulldog has a lot of creases and folds in her face, as is normal with the breed. I was noticing that her tears were building up in the creases and making her skin raw. I wanted an easy way to start cleaning her face but I didn't want something with fragrance or unnatural additives as Frenchies are prone to allergies. These have been perfect! Since receiving them I have begun cleaning her face daily and all of the build up is gone and the raw skin is healed. These are so easy to use it gives no excuse to not clean your pet!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Nice wet towelettes to keep ‘em clean! Hypoallergenic
customer_reviews.text: These are all I use! I have a spray bottle with a water, white vinegar & hydrogen peroxide mix & spray it on these when I want to make sure my dog’s feet and body are clean & germ free! But use them as is to wipe after she does her business.
customer_reviews.author: January

customer_reviews.title: ... almost all Earthbath products for my Yorkie and I love their products
customer_reviews.text: I purchase almost all Earthbath products for my Yorkie and I love their products. However, the Bath Wipes were received with a damaged container. The scent was barely noticeable and the wipes barely moistened. I returned the product, but I will continue to purchase the Earthbath products.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cordell

customer_reviews.title: Great wipes
customer_reviews.text: Does a decent job in between baths, and the wipes don't tear apart when I use them vigorously on my dogs' paws. One of the dogs is a long-hair, and for her the wipes don't do much except for on her paws. But that's to be expected. I really love that they are all natural and don't have harsh chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: PetLover

customer_reviews.title: She hates them
customer_reviews.text: But, she knows they help, when I get one out she goes and jumps on the couch waiting to get wiped down. Like I said she hates it, but always comes
customer_reviews.author: Gary Frechette

customer_reviews.title: Never Stop Making These Please
customer_reviews.text: Can't live without these wipes. People always remark on how clean our dog looks and how I must bathe him often. Ha! Nope, just wipe his bum and his paws whenever we come home from a walk. It's an easy habit to build; he just sit in the foyer waiting for his paws to get cleaned when we come in now! Full disclosure: He's also a very clean dog (Shiba) and grooms himself daily like a cat. I find the puppy branded ones clean better than the other scents, he never smells "doggy" when I use these versus the other scents from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for sensitive pets!
customer_reviews.text: I use Earthbath wipes to wipe down my dog's paws after trips outside. She has some sort of allergic reaction to many common lawn chemicals and other debris on the city sidewalks. These wipes are strong enough to do a good job cleaning her paws. Once we started using these, she completely stopped licking and chewing her paws (vet said it was caused by allergies/irritation). Since these are unscented and gentle, we also use them to clean her face and body between baths.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Ann

customer_reviews.title: I like this product but the reviews are correct that it ...
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but the reviews are correct that it doesn't close well enough to provide an air tight seal. Since I read reviews the before buying, I was prepared for this and have put the container in a large ziplock bag to hopefully prevent the wipes from drying out (this makes using them less than convenient to use). I like the wipes though because they are not greasy, have a pleasant but mild smell, and are a good size for my dogs. And the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Leaves my dogs coat so clean, healthy, and shiny. It’s as if I give him daily baths but they’re so gentle on his sensitive skin. Been using these for years, they’re the best! Mango’s my favorite scent but they’re all good.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Alexandre

customer_reviews.title: ... romp in the park or the beach and we love these Earthbath natural wipes
customer_reviews.text: We are neurotic about wiping down our pup after every romp in the park or the beach and we love these Earthbath natural wipes. It doesn't have an overwhelming scent but leaves our pup smelling fresh. It gets the job done as far as cleaning as concerned so we don't have to bathe him so frequently. We also always get compliments on how shiny his coat is and I feel that this product has contributed to that! We've gone through a few boxes and will definitely continue to purchase more.
customer_reviews.author: Mary P.

customer_reviews.title: Container does not close
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this brand. I think the wipe size is appropriate and the smell reminds me of candy however the container does not latch. The wipes are moist enough for a quick rub down but probably not enough for extremely muddy situations. Product would receive a higher rating if the container was reworked so that it closed.
customer_reviews.author: Freya Monster

customer_reviews.title: Works well for the apprehensive bather!
customer_reviews.text: Our chiquaqua hates water and hates baths! So, in my quest to find the "perfect" alternative, I stumbled upon this item. I was elated to find that these were not only natural, hypo-allergenic, and cruelty-free as well. Turns out that these have a pleasant smell, are not too soapy and actually do the job intended. These are gentle enough for me to wipe her face off and keep her paws clean too! No more running away at bath time since we got these. I totally recommend these to anyone who has a smaller breed dog or whose doggie is an indoor pooch (like ours). Give them a try and see for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: J. Paschal

customer_reviews.title: Love them unscented, soft wipes.
customer_reviews.text: These are great for wiping down the Cat or Dog after grooming to pull of any loose hair (helps reduce furballs) or just to give a quick sponge bath for them.
customer_reviews.author: Desdemona

customer_reviews.title: These wipes are "Eh!"
customer_reviews.text: Compared to another puppy wipes I used, I thought Earthbath was "eh!" It didn't have enough wetness to it to remove dirt or bodily mess. The smell, which I thought was unscented, actually had a scent "green clean", did not smell all that great like most of the reviews had mentioned. It would leave my puppy with a musky, cough syrup smell. And another thing, each wipe did not come out easily as we liked. Some would come out glued together and others come out leaving the rest behind. I think I'll go back to my previous order.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I've purchased this product and never again. Both times the box that it comes in would not close properly. The first time it was just a struggle and I figured I had a defective one. Now this time it won't close AT ALL. The fact that it arrived shrink wrapped was my first clue. And because it sold as an "add on" item there is no way to leave Amazon seller feedback. What a scam! Do not waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: MarciaB

customer_reviews.title: Earth Bath All Natural Grooming Wipes
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these wipes! I thought I would try this as an alternative to giving my dog a bath. My sweet old Brittany boy is over 16 yrs old and can no longer handle being bathed. It is extremely hard on his body and it is very stressful for him. So, I had to do something to refresh and actually clean his fur. These wipes did just that! Plus, he has had a couple of accidents...yes # 2 ones and using these wipes helped me more than I would have imagined for cleaning him totally up! They really do an excellent job! I am 100% with this product! Oh, Sam is just fine with them also! =)
customer_reviews.author: Smiley

customer_reviews.title: Dryyyyyyy
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like these, but they are crazy dry. It's like using a Kleenex on my dog. Won't order these again.
customer_reviews.author: Nadeem

product_meta.title: Earthbath All Natural Grooming Wipes
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1| Color:Hypo-Allergenic and Fragrence FreeUse these thick, large, moist wipes as a touch up grooming solution or as a bath alternative. Earthbath grooming wipes handily clean pets' dirty paws, undercoat, (dirty bottoms too.), while imparting a show quality shine. Remove dander, drool, discharge and cling ons from playing in the unknown. They contain only natural cleansers and conditioners, including exotic Hawaiian awapuhi extract, a shine enhancing coat conditioner. These natural wipes contain no animal by products (lanolin free) or alcohol and will not remove spot on flea control products. Both varieties contain Aloe Vera and Vitamin E to moisturize coat and skin. Notice how soft your hands are after wiping your pet. Safe for daily use on all animals over 6 weeks old.
feature_bullets: Totally natural pet care, 100 percent bio degradable and cruelty Free

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
